about_the_game:
Follow Asphodene and Eridani on their star-spanning adventure to portend the mysteries of their existence. Actively wield myriad weapons and their abilities in symphony to defeat those who would bar your path. Throughout your journey, court intriguing and vibrant passengers as you venture beyond the stars above.

A galaxy-spanning arsenal

With the power of the Spatial Disk, the Starfarers can wield the mnemoria of the worlds they visit as armaments in combat.

Unlock new weapons as you progress through the game, each with their own unique abilities and effects. Weapons are manually equipped and employ unique combo attacks and special abilities, leading to a much more involved combat system compared to other horde roguelikes.

Tactics twofold

Each character obtains their own set of weapons and passive abilities during the course of a run; swap between them at will, enabling even more skill expression and combat diversity. Discover unique combinations and tailor the equipment of your characters to the challenges you'll face to overcome the odds and emerge triumphant.

An ever-changing battlefield

The rank and file do answer to someone, however... After defeating enough foes, you'll be confronted by powerful bosses in unique arenas. These bosses will challenge your mettle in varied and distinct ways; prove your worth and test your newfound abilities to emerge victorious. Defeating these foes will earn you new weapons to bolster your arsenal for the journey ahead, but your defeat will see you back to the beginning.

Betwixt the cosmos

Each world on their journey is different; expect to see a variety of locales during each run, providing new challenges and rewards in turn. After combat, commune with the denizens of the planet and aid their concerns before moving on. Meet unique and interesting individuals with colorful personalities, building rapport and gaining power in turn.

name: Second Stellar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10/11/12 compatible GPU with at least 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Join twin Starfarers Asphodene and Eridani as they traverse the cosmos in this unique action roguelite, unraveling the mysteries of their galaxy and beyond in pursuit of the Voyager.
